name: Cleave
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: May repeat once on a different enemy hero.
_(You may repeat even if the original target was a minion.)_

name: Desperate Cleave
text:
Target a hero adjacent to you.
After the attack: May repeat once on a different enemy hero.

name: Siren's Call
text: Target an enemy unit not adjacent to you and in range; if able, move that unit up to 3 spaces to a space adjacent to you.

name: Metamorphosis
text:
Gain +1 ::movement:: Movement and +1 ::initiative:: Initiative for each enemy unit adjacent to you.
You may move through obstacles.

name: Stone Gaze
text:
**Next turn:** Enemy heroes in radius count as both heroes and terrain, and cannot perform movement actions.
_(If you move, the radius “moves” with you)_

name: Threatening Slash
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
+1 ::attack:: Attack for each other enemy unit adjacent to you.
_(Do not count the target when calculating the attack bonus.)_

name: Charm
text: Before or after movement, you may move an enemy ranged minion in radius up to 2 spaces.

name: Petrifying Stare
text: **Next turn:** Enemy heroes in radius count as both heroes and terrain, and cannot perform movement actions.

name: Deadly Swipe
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
+2 ::attack:: Attack for each other enemy unit adjacent to you.

name: Control
text: Before or after movement, you may move an enemy ranged or melee minion in radius up to 2 spaces.

name: Fresh Converts
text: If you are adjacent to an enemy minion, you may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Long Thrust
text: Target a unit in range. +1 ::range:: Range for each enemy unit adjacent to you.

name: Constrict
text:
**End of round:** Defeat an enemy melee minion adjacent to you.
_(Before the end of round minion battle.)_

name: Turn into Statues
text: **Next turn:** Enemy heroes in radius count as both heroes and terrain, and cannot perform movement actions.

name: Lethal Spin
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
+3 ::attack:: Attack for each other enemy unit adjacent to you.

name: Dominate
text: Before or after movement, you may move an enemy minion in radius up to 2 spaces; ignore heavy minion immunity.

name: Devoted Followers
text: If you are adjacent to an enemy unit, you may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Rapid Thrusts
text:
Target a unit in range. +1 ::range:: Range for each enemy unit adjacent to you.
May repeat once on a different enemy hero.

name: Final Embrace
text: **End of round:** Defeat an enemy melee or ranged minion adjacent to you.
